"'Holiday Inn' is cheerful, cosy and just occasionally cheesy stuff. Itâ€™s an amiable family show full of warm-hearted sincerity and resolutely old-fashioned values...Director Gordon Greenberg has co-written the knowingly affectionate book with Chad Hodge, and allows choreographer Denis Jones to showcase some pretty nifty tap routines...Though most of the large ensemble are playing walking cliches, it is done with effortless skill."
